title: Arcade nocturne skin
body:
Pac man sound effects a must.


http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EWouyS0JKzI/VE_eMdo01tI/AAAAAAAABDM/ZzYHZyryOW0/s1600/riotIdeas.jpg

replies.body:
Looks like a galaga enemy!!!!

Passive could be a duck hunt white square
Q a laser, with the trail being a rainbow-road thing
W a rpg standard shield effect 
E could have a pixellated pulse
R would be "Red ring of deeeeaaaaathhh"

> [{quoted}](name=Akenero,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=mu84cEx6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-02T20:02:09.429+0000)
>
> Looks like a galaga enemy!!!!
> 
> Passive could be a duck hunt white square
> Q a laser, with the trail being a rainbow-road thing
> W a rpg standard shield effect 
> E could have a pixellated pulse
> R would be "Red ring of deeeeaaaaathhh"

red ring of death. i like that. damn that brings back painful memories
What about him going rainbow like after getting a star in Mario
i think a final boss nocturne would have been a better idea

> [{quoted}](name=DeadJokr,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=mu84cEx6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-02T20:49:37.621+0000)
>
> i think a final boss nocturne would have been a better idea

he for sure would be best on the side with veigar and blitz.
Why isnt Teemo a Final Boss? He is so fucking evil... damn i feel poisoned and sick already, just thinking about Teemo is making me woozy hold on.... DAMN RAINBOW WHAT?

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/undertale/images/8/8a/Untitled.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150923221632

Just reminded me of it.
http://graphics8.nytimes.com/packages/images/blogs/tmagazine/buzzfeed/06-Upvote.gif
make it a boss skin and you've got me hooked.
Would you believe that Nocturne hasn't gotten a skin since December 5th, 2012?

> [{quoted}](name=Oxbridge,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=mu84cEx6,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-01-02T21:50:47.919+0000)
>
> Would you believe that Nocturne hasn't gotten a skin since December 5th, 2012?

I would, cause I main him, and I got that skin.
Hehe, time to spur Riot on to make a new skin for him, amirite?

> [{quoted}](name=Oxbridge,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=mu84cEx6,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2016-01-03T09:15:38.190+0000)
>
> Hehe, time to spur Riot on to make a new skin for him, amirite?

You are indeed right.

Top: Beat-em-up Boss ???
Jungle: Secret Boss Nocturne
Mid: Final Boss Veigar
ADC: Shmup Boss ???
Support: Battle Boss Blitzcrank

Top: Beat-em-up Boss i think yorick would work great for this position. 

ADC: Shmup Boss  this one is hard to choose

Top: Lee sin top even tho thats not meta but Lee sin is like a Beat Em Up kinda guy
ADC: New Champ Jhin or Deadeye
I'm thinking Graves would work for it, considering he has great kill potential and has multiple projectiles for his basic attacks.
I always thought Raid-Boss Nasus would be a good top laner for the group

Reminds me of Rainbowdash...

Haven't been interested in the fandom for awhile, but this is pretty striking (especially the blu-ish metal tint)
If u looking for Rainbow Dash, you need Hecarim

I like this idea and personally being a proficient Nocturne player, I like it... 
However i have to say that Riot makes skins but they are based on the Champion Theme

Arcade would ruin Nocturne's theme and therefore, he would never get an Arcade skin

sorry ( i may be secretly working at Riot you will never know)

(***sssshhhh Riot dont tell them***)
Oh gawd.. Can i refund my Eternum skin? Sorry riot it's out of date.
Mini Boss Nocturne feels better tbh. I don't think Nocturne would be on side with Sona / Miss Fortune etc.
Secret boss or hidden boss
I think Final Boss Nocturne would be great. I think it should use the body of the top left one, the head of the bottom one, and the blades of the top right one.
I need this in my life.
Like the second one, but maybe making the colors darker because Nocturne is yeah.....all about dark xD
Yes, the video arcade nightmare. The ghost in the machine.

> [{quoted}](name=zangager,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=mu84cEx6,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-01-03T01:13:07.041+0000)
>
> Yes, the video arcade nightmare. The ghost in the machine.

Now that you mention it, Nocturne isn't a physical being, yet he became one because of nexuses and summoners.

So what about an Arcade boss brought to life?

we also need arcade skins for
{{champion:245}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:51}}  {{champion:1}}
Looks pretty cool, but they already have an Arcade Jungler, this should be a Boss skin since they only have a support and mid laner for Boss. The only arcade roll not done is mid lane
I havent played Nocturne since preseason started, but would still buy this skin...
holy shit this is great

I don't get it

It doesn't very well resemble any game or style and even more I don't get why there would be "pac man" sound effects unless you meant he looks like inky blinky etc then maybe.

IF there was an arcade nocturne I think he should look like a galaga space ship because the way he stands with his armblades already makes him look like a hovering alien spaceship.
